alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Iron; Marquette; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN IRON...WEST CENTRAL MARQUETTE...SOUTHWESTERN HOUGHTON...SOUTHEASTERN ONTONAGON AND SOUTHWESTERN BARAGA COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT/245 PM CDT/... At 255 PM EDT/155 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Covington to near Kenton to 8 miles southeast of Northern Lake Gogebic. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Covington, Squaw Lake, Kenton, Bruce Crossing, Paulding, Amasa, U.S. 141 between Covington and Amasa, Sidnaw, Witch Lake, Lake Michigamme, Republic, Trout Creek, King Lake, Watton, Big Bass Lake, Paint Lake, Bond Falls, Ewen, Ned Lake, and Bone Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baraga; Iron; Marquette; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton
